title: Orbea Factory Team Uncovers the Cape Epic in “The Mecca of MTB”
content:
Orbea Factory Team Uncovers the Cape Epic in "The Mecca of MTB"

For many, the Absa Cape Epic is the pinnacle of an MTB race. With growing popularity and media attention year after year, it has earned the name of the “Mountain Tour de France” among the cycling community.

In this documentary, Orbea Factory Team rider Ibon Zugasti and KMC Orbea rider Oliver Avilés show us everything about this race and how the region welcomes cyclists with open arms.

Trails made and cared for by hand and enthusiastic spectators throughout the entire route are just some of the examples that make the Absa Cape Epic a truly special event.
